nws.name: Overnight
nws.shortForecast: Light Snow Likely And Patchy Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. Low around 11, with temperatures rising to around 20 overnight. Northwest wind around 30 mph, with gusts as high as 47 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Light Snow Likely And Patchy Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely and patchy blowing snow. Cloudy. High near 20, with temperatures falling to around 11 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 28 to 33 mph, with gusts as high as 49 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around -6, with temperatures rising to around -3 overnight. Wind chill values as low as -26. Northwest wind 20 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 36 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 15. Wind chill values as low as -27. Northwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night

nws.name: Sunday

nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 27. Northwest wind 18 to 28 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
